SEARCH
Package Models

Class AppointmentManager

java.lang.Object
Models.AppointmentManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
AppointmentInterface
public class AppointmentManager extends Object implements AppointmentInterface
Manages the lifecycle and data operations of appointments, including creating, updating, and retrieving them.

  • Constructor Details

    • AppointmentManager

      public AppointmentManager()

  • Method Details

    • initializeObjects

      public static void initializeObjects()
      Initializes the appointment objects by reading them from the CSV file. If no data exists, creates an empty CSV file with headers.

    • saveAppointments

      public static void saveAppointments()
      Saves the current list of appointments to the CSV file.

    • scheduleAppointment

      public static void scheduleAppointment(String patientID, String doctorID, String timeSlotID, Service service)
      Schedules a new appointment by creating it and associating it with a specified time slot.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The ID of the patient for the appointment.
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor for the appointment.
      timeSlotID - The ID of the time slot reserved for the appointment.
      service - The service type for the appointment.

    • updateAppointmentStatus

      public static void updateAppointmentStatus(String appointmentID, AppointmentStatus status)
      Updates the status of an existing appointment.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - The ID of the appointment to update.
      status - The new status to set for the appointment.

    • markAppointmentCompleted

      public static void markAppointmentCompleted(String appointmentID)
      Marks an appointment as completed and updates the associated time slot status.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - The ID of the appointment to mark as completed.

    • getAllAppointments

      public static List<Appointment> getAllAppointments()
      Retrieves a list of all appointments.
      Returns:
      A list of all appointments.

    • getAppointmentsByDoctorID

      public static List<Appointment> getAppointmentsByDoctorID(String doctorID)
      Retrieves appointments associated with a specific doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor.
      Returns:
      A list of appointments for the specified doctor.

    • getAppointmentsByPatientID

      public static List<Appointment> getAppointmentsByPatientID(String patientID)
      Retrieves appointments associated with a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The ID of the patient.
      Returns:
      A list of appointments for the specified patient.
